text: Rosemarie DeWitt (born October 26, 1971) is an American actress. She played Emily Lehman in the Fox television series Standoff. She played Amy Bowen in the 2015 remake movie Poltergeist. She was born in Flushing, Queens, New York. DeWitt married Ron Livingston in 2009. They have two children. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Queens Category:1971 births Category:Living people
title: Rosemarie DeWitt
